member.name: ITfFnConfigureRegisterEudc.Show
member.summary: The ITfFnConfigureRegisterEudc.Show method shows the EUDC key sequence register UI.
member.param: [in] Handle of the parent window. The text service typically uses this as the parent or owner window when creating a dialog box.
[in] Contains a LANGID value that specifies the identifier of the language.
[in] Contains a GUID value that specifies the language profile identifier that the text service is under.

[in, unique] Contains a BSTR that contains the EUDC to be registered with the text service. This is optional and can be NULL. If NULL, the text service should display a default register EUDC dialog box.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfFnConfigureRegisterEudc
member.summary: The ITfFnConfigureRegisterEudc interface is implemented by a text service to provide the UI to register the key sequence for the given EUDC.
